(ii) In vivo experiments.
In vivo animal experiments were approved by the Animal Ethics Committee of Shanghai Institute of Materia Medica, and performed according to procedures approved by the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee of Shanghai Institute of Materia Medica, Chinese Academy of Science. Male Wistar rats were obtained from Shanghai SLAC Laboratory Animal Co., Ltd. (Shanghai, China). The rats were given free access to water and a standard diet under controlled humidity (45% to 55%) and temperature (20°C to 24°C), except in the overnight fasting period before administration of cycleanine. The rats were adapted to the environment for a week.
